line_2: An' now, auld Cloots, I ken ye're thinkan,
Some luckless hour will send him linkan,
But faith! he'll turn a corner jinkan,

line_1: The wale o' cocks for fun an' drinkin!
The wale o' cocks for fun an' drinkin!
line_2: There's monie godly folks are thinkin,

line_1: The wale o' cocks for fun an' drinkin!
line_2: Will send you, Korah-like, a sinkin,
